pros: A great place to work. The teamwork is one of the best I have seen, especially between the projects. The family setting makes it easy to grow professionally.
cons: Not much for cons, we have a lot of improptu projects, but then again this occurs rarely.

review_title: Great, demanding and encouraging to work.

pros: The team work as a family, result oriented.
